pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karonti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.4_0: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karissanti, seyyathāpi gihī kāmabhogino”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.5_0: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.6_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.7_0: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.8_0: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karothā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.11_0: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karissatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.13_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.14.1_0: “Na udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.15_0: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena gilānā bhikkhū udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi kātuṁ kukkuccāyanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.3_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.4_0: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānena bhikkhunā udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi kātuṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.5_0: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.6.1_0: “Na udake agilāno uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.7_0: Na udake agilānena uccāro vā passāvo vā kheḷo vā kātabbo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.8_0: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake agilāno uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karoti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
